name: They Live (Veguista)
description:
You have mysteriously been gifted a polaroid camera. However, this polaroid does not make normal photographs...

Make your way to the end of the level, opening the secret door and uncovering all the aliens in your office.

Student project adapting the movie They Live (1988). The project was developed by one person for 2 weeks.
I do not own the rights to the movie. This is a prove of concept.

The following assets not created by me were used in the game:

  • "Camera Shutter, Fast, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
  • "Camera shutter and flash combined" by montclairguy of Freesound.org
  • "taking a Polaroid photo" by larspriebe of Freesound.org
  • "Sci-Fi Force Field Impact 15.wav" by StormwaveAudio of Freesound.org
  • "Laser Charging" by plasterbrain of Freesound.org
  • "Page flipping.wav" by carlerichudon10 of Freesound.org
  • "Human Base Mesh Animated" by CG_Luke of Turbosquid (both mesh and idle animation implemented).
  • American flag photo, "Jaws" poster, and "The Thing" poster from Google Images.
